funFacts: This city is known as the financial capital of India
Home to Bollywood, the world's largest film industry
The city has a unique mix of colonial and modern architecture
Local street food is famous worldwide
One of the most densely populated cities in the world
famousFoods: Vada Pav - Spicy potato fritter in a bun
Pav Bhaji - Vegetable curry with bread
Bhel Puri - Puffed rice snack with chutneys
Keema Pav - Minced meat with bread
famousPlaces: Gateway of India - Iconic monument overlooking the Arabian Sea
Marine Drive - Scenic promenade along the coast
Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus - UNESCO World Heritage railway station
Juhu Beach - Popular beach with food stalls
